What is Gridfox?

Gridfox allows businesses to create a single source of truth with the latest information.

Better than Spreadsheets

Fully version controlled and audited, so that you can make faster and more accurate decisions.

Across your devices

Gridfox works across all your devices, so that you can view and edit data from anywhere.
